name: Ball Bounce
description:
My first game using Unity.

Use W,A,S,D  or set custom key bindings to move the green ball.

Colliding green ball with:

             red ball will add one point.

             yellow ball will deduct points.

             blue ball will lose game.

If blue ball and yellow ball collide, then they both will disappear.

The game will store your high score and options on the local machine. This means that the information will be saved regardless of you closing the web browser or restarting the machine, however, if you play the game on a different machine, then you will not have the same options/high score.
